mapper.select: select schedule_id , route_id , route_code , plan_date , plan_time , start_direction , start_order_number , trip_end_time , service_type , service_name , direction , bus_code , bus_id , bus_name , (decode(p.start_direction, 0, '上', 1, '下', '') || p.start_order_number) as bus_name_full , FIRST_ROUTE_STA_ID , LAST_ROUTE_STA_ID from DY_SCHEDULE_PLAN_DRIVERLESS p where P.route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and p.trip_end_time >= #{runDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and p.plan_time <= #{runDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + 1 / 24 and p.STATUS = #{scheduleStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select * from ( select count(1) as BUS_NUMBER from (select distinct t.start_direction,t.start_order_number from DY_SCHEDULE_PLAN_DRIVERLESS t where t.ROUTE_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and trunc(t.PLAN_DATE) = trunc(to_date( #{runDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))) ) aa, ( select count(1) as SINGLE_BUS_NUMBER from (select distinct t.start_direction,t.start_order_number from DY_SCHEDULE_PLAN_DRIVERLESS t where t.ROUTE_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and trunc(t.PLAN_DATE) = trunc(to_date( #{runDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and t.SERVICE_TYPE=-32) ) bb

select * from (select t.* , case when t.first_round_task_id is not null and t.first_round_service_type!= 1 then t.first_round_service_name || '(' || t.first_round_route_sub_name || ')' when t.first_round_task_id is not null and t.first_round_service_type = 1 then t.first_round_service_name when t.sync_plan = 1 then '' else t.service_name end as first_round_task_name , case when t.first_round_plan_time_temp is null then t.plan_time else t.first_round_plan_time_temp end as first_round_plan_time, tt.o_bus_id, tt.o_bus_name, case when tt.o_start_direction is null then t.start_direction else tt.o_start_direction end as o_start_direction, case when tt.o_start_order_number is null then t.start_order_number else tt.o_start_order_number end as o_start_order_number, case when t.first_route_sta_id is null and midway_first_station_id is null then t.o_first_route_sta_id when t.first_route_sta_id is null then midway_first_station_id else t.first_route_sta_id end as first_station_id, case when t.first_route_sta_name is null and midway_first_station_name is null then t.o_first_route_sta_name when t.first_route_sta_name is null then midway_first_station_name else t.first_route_sta_name end as first_station_name
from (select * from (select t.schedule_id , t.plan_time , t.bus_id , t.bus_name , t.start_direction , t.start_order_number , row_number() over (partition by t.start_direction,t.start_order_number order by t.plan_time) as rn ,t.bus_code , t.service_type , t.service_name , t.first_round_plan_time as first_round_plan_time_temp , t.first_round_task_id , t.sync_plan , tt.first_station_id as first_route_sta_id , tt.first_station_name as first_route_sta_name , t.first_route_sta_id as o_first_route_sta_id , t.first_route_sta_name as o_first_route_sta_name , tt.service_type as first_round_service_type , tt.service_name as first_round_service_name , tt.route_sub_name as first_round_route_sub_name
, ttt.midway_plan_time , ttt.task_id as midway_task_id , ttt.START_DIRECTION as midway_start_direction , ttt.START_ORDER_NUMBER as midway_start_order_number , tttt.first_station_id as midway_first_station_id , tttt.first_station_name as midway_first_station_name , case when ttt.task_id is not null and tttt.service_type !=1 then tttt.service_name || '(' || tttt.route_sub_name || ')' else tttt.service_name end as midway_task_name
from DY_SCHEDULE_PLAN_DRIVERLESS t left join apts.v_dispatch_task tt on (t.first_round_task_id = tt.routesub_id and tt.route_id = t.route_id) left join dy_midway_short_station ttt on (t.plan_date = ttt.run_date and t.route_id = ttt.route_id and t.START_DIRECTION = ttt.START_DIRECTION and t.START_ORDER_NUMBER = ttt.START_ORDER_NUMBER) left join apts.v_dispatch_task tttt on (ttt.task_id = tttt.routesub_id and ttt.route_id = tttt.route_id) where t.route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.plan_date = to_date(#{runDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') order by t.start_direction, t.start_order_number) t where t.rn = 1) t FULL OUTER JOIN (select * from (select t.plan_time , t.bus_id as o_bus_id , b.bus_name as o_bus_name , t.start_direction as o_start_direction , t.start_order_number as o_start_order_number , row_number() over (partition by t.start_direction,t.start_order_number order by t.plan_time) as rn ,t.sync_plan from DY_SCHEDULE_PLAN_DRIVERLESS t left join apts.bs_bus b on t.bus_id = b.bus_id where t.route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.plan_date = to_date(#{referenceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') order by t.start_direction, t.start_order_number) tt where tt.rn = 1) tt on (t.start_direction = tt.o_start_direction and t.start_order_number = tt.o_start_order_number)) t order by t.o_start_direction, t.o_start_order_number

select distinct bus_id, bus_name, route_name from (select to_number(bus_id) bus_id, bus_name, route_name_run as route_name from (select distinct t.bus_id, t.bus_name, t.route_name_run from apts.dy_triplog t where t.run_date >= to_date(#{referenceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.run_date <= (to_date(#{referenceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 7) and t.route_id_run = #{routeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) union all select b.bus_id, b.bus_name, r.route_name from apts.bs_bus b left join apts.bs_route r on b.route_id = r.route_id where b.route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} or b.route_id_night = #{routeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) order by bus_name
